$ cat about.txt

Welcome to SLANOSEC, a place that highlights various security exploits, open vulnerabilities, projects, tools, and discussions

In an attempt to keep this site secure, and free from all the bloat floating around the internet, this site is mainly primitive html with minimal .js overhead
